::Stratus::

Stratus walks out behind Motormaster, his weapons ready. He looks 
around at the scene, hiding his look of shock. He had never seen such 
destruction in his life!



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Jeremiah <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> Motormaster hears Scourge, "Astroblast, stay in flight, we may need 
to
> depart quickly" he walks over to the hatch, and opens it, hoping 
out, and
> waiting for Stratus to follow. "Greetings Scourge. I'm not quite 
sure
> myself, but this is where the signal came from." He looks around, 
(This is
